test_message: Extract all compliance rules from the investment management agreement focusing on cash limits, equity concentration, and geographic restrictions.

source_section.exact_quote:
Net cash 0 -3% max.
Gross cash 0 -3% max. The manager will hedge as much as possible against the dividend receivables recorded by the trust bank and will strive for full investment. (However, the upper/lower limit may be temporarily exceeded when investment is redeemed or when we receive additional investment by transfer in kinds, etc.)

extracted_rules.exception_conditions: Limits may be temporarily exceeded during investment redemptions or transfers in-kind.

extracted_rules.value_threshold: Whichever is lower: 10% weight or Benchmark weight + 7% active weight (single stock)

source_section.paragraph: 10 Tracking errors and other risk metrics
source_section.exact_quote:
Single stock limit
Whichever the lower limit of 10% weight or less than BM weight +7% active weight Daily

extracted_rules.value_threshold: Less than BM weight +/- 15% active weight (by sector)

source_section.paragraph: 10 Tracking errors and other risk metrics
source_section.exact_quote: Sector Weight Less than BM weight +/- 15% active weight Daily

source_section.paragraph: 10 Tracking errors and other risk metrics
source_section.exact_quote: Off BM stock limit Less than 20% weight Daily

extracted_rules.value_threshold: Less than 10% weight (included in the Off BM stocks cap)

source_section.paragraph: 10 Tracking errors and other risk metrics
source_section.exact_quote: Off BM Country weight (MSCI Country Classification) Less than 10% weight (Included in the Off BM stocks cap) Daily

extracted_rules.value_threshold: Multinational corporations only, compliant with developed market stocks (countries in MSCI ACWI Index)

source_section.exact_quote: Investments in off-benchmark county stocks will be limited to multinational corporations compliant with the developed market stocks and are included in the MSCI ACWI Index constituent countries.

extracted_rules.value_threshold: Yen-denominated stocks listed on Japanese stock exchanges (including REITs, preferred stocks, preferred equity certificates); foreign-currency-denominated depository receipts not permitted.

source_section.exact_quote: Japanese Stocks Investment for Japanese stocks will be yen- denominated stocks listed on Japanese stock exchanges, including real estate investment trust (REIT), preferred stocks, and preferred equity certificates. Investments will not be allowed in foreign-currency-denominated depository receipts (e.g., ADRs).

flagged_for_review.reason: Rule threshold regarding 'multinational corporations compliant with developed market stocks' is somewhat open to interpretation and dependent on MSCI ACWI constituent list. Clarity of enforcement may vary.
